subject: Creation of interdepartmental committee for monitoring of projects on continuous basis for ensuring the time and cost bon implementation;monitoring performance of contractors/consultants.
text: #Rd 77fv rTHrf faarot 1414 'Phone ; 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma 9a67, 73r Ya67 &< Tounf TFT4) 4477 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QTRI. /Exln:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 Qa 6, #ez-10, ETGT, #f fardit:110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No: NHAI/11041/199/2006-Admn: 5th February 2008 OFFICE ORDER Consequent upon approval of   Competent Authority , an interdepartmental committee comprising of following officers has been formulated under the Chairmanship of Member (Admn): i) Shri Atul Kumar, CGM(IT) ji) Shri S C Jindal, CGM(T) Shri S K Puri, CGM(T) 3 Shri G P Chand_ GM(MIS) Shri Ajmer Singh, DGM(PSQ) vi) Shri P K Mahopatra, DGM(MIS) (Convener) 2, The committee is for monitoring of projects on continuous basis for ensuring the time and cost bond implementation, monitoring performance of contractorslconsultants and building data base on them which will be utilised while taking decision on award of new contract 3 The committee will meet every 15 days to review the projects and performance of contractorslconsultants. (V K Sharma) GM (Admn) To : PS to Chairman PS to all Members AII CGMsICVO All GMsIDGMs/Managers All PIUsICMUs Librarian/Hindi Officer (ManM NHAL
